activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7159
activity.text: 👋 Hey folks! Super excited to be here in the chat! 🚀 I'm Shubhradip Sarkar, a final year student at NIT DGP, majoring in ECE. 💡 My tech toolkit includes MERN stack, GraphQL, Next.js, Django, WebSocket, MongoDB, and Postgres. 🛠️ Previously, I've had the incredible experience of working at Samsung over the summer. Let's exchange ideas, talk code, and explore the wonders of technology together! 💻✨
